abstract: Terra-Gen Power, a major developer of wind, solar and geothermal energy projects in the United States, is $1.2 billion closer to building the country’s largest wind farm.
snippet: Terra-Gen Power, a major developer of wind, solar and geothermal energy projects in the United States, is $1.2 billion closer to building the country’s largest wind farm.

headline.main: Terra-Gen Raises $1.2 Billion for Wind Farm
